title: As Ex-Abercrombie CEO Probed For Sex Abuse, 8 More Male Models Say #MeToo
content: The former CEO of American fashion brand Abercrombie & Fitch is facing fresh allegations of abuse at sex events across the world, according to a BBC investigation.
summary: The former CEO of American fashion brand Abercrombie & Fitch is facing fresh allegations of abuse at sex events across the world, according to a BBC investigation.

title: Indian Navy's Top Meet Amid Bangladesh Crisis, China's Aggressive Tactics
content: The top commanders of the Indian Navy will hold a meeting to review the security situation in and around the country from Tuesday amid growing instability in the region.
summary: The top commanders of the Indian Navy will hold a meeting to review the security situation in and around the country from Tuesday amid growing instability in the region.

title: India Sends Relief Supplies To Typhoon-Hit Myanmar, Laos And Vietnam
content: India on Sunday sent urgent relief materials to Myanmar, Laos and Vietnam under an operation christened 'Sadbhav' to assist them in dealing with the impact of a major typhoon.
summary: India on Sunday sent urgent relief materials to Myanmar, Laos and Vietnam under an operation christened 'Sadbhav' to assist them in dealing with the impact of a major typhoon.

title: ''Terrifying'': China Woman Finds Human Tooth In Mooncake, Probe Underway
content: She confirmed the tooth wasn't from anyone in her family and immediately reported the incident to the police.
summary: She confirmed the tooth wasn't from anyone in her family and immediately reported the incident to the police.

title: French Authorities Confirm 8 Migrants Died In Channel Crossing Attempt
content: Eight migrants died early Sunday when their overcrowded vessel capsized while trying to cross the Channel from France to England, French authorities said, less than two weeks after the deadliest such disaster this year.
summary: Eight migrants died early Sunday when their overcrowded vessel capsized while trying to cross the Channel from France to England, French authorities said, less than two weeks after the deadliest such disaster this year.

title: Historic SpaceX Polaris Dawn Splashes Down After First Private Spacewalk
content: SpaceX's Polaris Dawn mission capsule splashed down off the coast of Florida early Sunday after making history when its crew conducted the first-ever spacewalk by non-government astronauts.
summary: SpaceX's Polaris Dawn mission capsule splashed down off the coast of Florida early Sunday after making history when its crew conducted the first-ever spacewalk by non-government astronauts.

title: Missile Fired From Yemen Fell Into Central Israel, Military Says
content: The Israeli military said a missile fired from Yemen crossed into central Israel on Sunday, causing no injuries but again adding to regional tensions nearly a year into the Gaza war.
summary: The Israeli military said a missile fired from Yemen crossed into central Israel on Sunday, causing no injuries but again adding to regional tensions nearly a year into the Gaza war.

title: Tasmanian Skull Theft: 150-Year-Old Crime Still Dividing A City
content: Over 150 years ago, surgeon and politician William Crowther allegedly stole the skull of an Aboriginal leader, William Lanne, from a Hobart morgue.
summary: Over 150 years ago, surgeon and politician William Crowther allegedly stole the skull of an Aboriginal leader, William Lanne, from a Hobart morgue.

title: World's Top 10 Most-Visited Theme Parks
content: Leading the pack, Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom in Orlando retained its title as the most-visited theme park, drawing 17.7 million guests.
summary: Leading the pack, Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom in Orlando retained its title as the most-visited theme park, drawing 17.7 million guests.

title: Michaela DePrince, America's Trailblazing Ballerina, Dies Aged 29
content: DePrince, who rose from being an orphan in war-torn Sierra Leone to international fame, was hailed as an "unforgettable inspiration" by her family.
summary: DePrince, who rose from being an orphan in war-torn Sierra Leone to international fame, was hailed as an "unforgettable inspiration" by her family.

title: Generative AI Uses More Energy, Is 'Accelerating Climate Crisis' : Experts
content: If you care about the environment, think twice about using AI.
summary: If you care about the environment, think twice about using AI.

title: Watch: Two Russian Couples Get Married As Per Hindu Rituals In Haridwar
content: The couples were dressed in traditional Indian attire, with the brides sporting mehndi (henna) designs on their hands.
summary: The couples were dressed in traditional Indian attire, with the brides sporting mehndi (henna) designs on their hands.

title: Albert Einstein's 1939 Atomic Bomb Warning Letter Sells For Rs 32.7 Crore
content: This letter, which played a pivotal role in the development of the atomic bomb, was originally addressed to the US president.
summary: This letter, which played a pivotal role in the development of the atomic bomb, was originally addressed to the US president.

title: Swiss Inaugurates New Supercomputer Alps, With Emphasis On AI Solutions
content: Switzerland on Saturday inaugurated its new supercomputer called Alps -- one of the world's fastest -- which it hopes will help place the country first for trustworthy artificial intelligence solutions.
summary: Switzerland on Saturday inaugurated its new supercomputer called Alps -- one of the world's fastest -- which it hopes will help place the country first for trustworthy artificial intelligence solutions.

title: Russia, Ukraine Exchange 206 Prisoners In Second Swap In 2 Days
content: Russia and Ukraine conducted a major exchange of 206 prisoners on Saturday, 103 apiece, in their second such swap in two days, following negotiations mediated by the United Arab Emirates, officials said.
summary: Russia and Ukraine conducted a major exchange of 206 prisoners on Saturday, 103 apiece, in their second such swap in two days, following negotiations mediated by the United Arab Emirates, officials said.

title: Donald Trump Pledges Mass Deportation Of Haitians In Ohio City If Elected
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump pledged on Friday to conduct mass deportations of Haitian immigrants from the Ohio city of Springfield, even though the majority of them are in the United States legally.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump pledged on Friday to conduct mass deportations of Haitian immigrants from the Ohio city of Springfield, even though the majority of them are in the United States legally.

title: Son Of Norway Crown Princess Arrested For Violating Restraining Order: Cops
content: Norwegian police said on Saturday that the 27-year-old son of Crown Princess Mette-Marit had been arrested for violating a restraining order.
summary: Norwegian police said on Saturday that the 27-year-old son of Crown Princess Mette-Marit had been arrested for violating a restraining order.

title: "Shame Must Change Sides": France's Mass Rape Survivor Now A Feminist Icon
content: Walking into court each day with her head held high, the ex-wife of a Frenchman on trial for orchestrating her mass rape in her own bed for almost a decade has become a feminist icon.
summary: Walking into court each day with her head held high, the ex-wife of a Frenchman on trial for orchestrating her mass rape in her own bed for almost a decade has become a feminist icon.

title: Russia, Ukraine Swap 206 Prisoners Of War In UAE-Brokered Deal
content: Moscow and Kyiv swapped 103 prisoners of war each on Saturday in a deal brokered by the United Arab Emirates, a rare moment of coordination between the two warring sides as Russia pushes ahead in east Ukraine.
summary: Moscow and Kyiv swapped 103 prisoners of war each on Saturday in a deal brokered by the United Arab Emirates, a rare moment of coordination between the two warring sides as Russia pushes ahead in east Ukraine.

title: AI Can Change Belief In Conspiracy Theories, Study Finds
content: The study suggests that AI could play a significant role in combating misinformation, though questions remain about how AI achieves this and whether it would be embraced in real-world settings.
summary: The study suggests that AI could play a significant role in combating misinformation, though questions remain about how AI achieves this and whether it would be embraced in real-world settings.
